content: a half-granny variation on the simple gaiter i had some leftover aran weight acrylic that i made this with but you may absolutely use your favorite wool if you prefer this clear and straight-forward design will leave you thinking who needs a pattern it works up so fast that you will be weaving in ends before you know it great for a last minute gift charity crafting or just to keep your fingers busy while you watch tv easily adaptable to give it your own personal touch **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours **
